abstract: Fox overwhelmingly dominated the ratings Tuesday night thanks to the one-two punch of the popular shows “American Idol” and “House.” At 8 p.m., “Idol” delivered an average of 28.1 million viewers, and “House” reeled in 22.5 million at 9 p.m.
lead_paragraph: Fox overwhelmingly dominated the ratings Tuesday night thanks to the one-two punch of the popular shows “American Idol” and “House.” At 8 p.m., “Idol” delivered an average of 28.1 million viewers, and “House” reeled in 22.5 million at 9 p.m.
